oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mid-Day Merry-Go-Round - 18th Anniversary clips [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two clips taken from the 18th anniversary celebration of radio station WNOX's program Mid-Day Merry-Go-Round, featuring Lowell Blanchard, announcer Jerry (last name unknown), a performance by Eddie Hill, and a conversation with Mr. Hugh Fielden. The disc originally contained three clips, however the first was not transferable due to considerable missing lacquer. Clips two and three were transferred in reverse order to prevent further damage to the disc (see label info for original track order).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddie Hill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Lowell Blanchard introduces Eddie Hill -- Eddie Hill and Lowell Blanchard talk -- Molasses (Eddie Hill) -- Lowell Blanchard thanks Eddie Hill -- Jerry [?] introduces Hugh Fielden -- Hugh Fielden and Lowell Blanchard talk
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WNOX (Radio station : Knoxville, Tenn.); Mid-day merry-go-round (Radio program); Blanchard, Lowell, 1910-1968; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994
